Articles.Content: for some reason I've been without shadows for a while now, which gets problematic when landing a booster on its flames. So my question is, which thing in the options menu do I need to fiddle with to bring back shadows?

It's in the main settings menu on the title screen under Settings> Graphics> Video> Shadow Cascades.

Edited January 28, 2015 by Tank Buddy

It's in the main settings menu on the title screen under Settings> Graphics> Video> Shadow Cascades.

well I had that set to ten. cranking it up to forty changed nothing so I assumed it was something else.

Do you have any mods installed? If so, try removing one at a time to try to fix it, or re-install KSP (validate files if you have Steam: https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=2037-QEUH-3335)

I got distracted by KSP, sorry I could't respond sooner

Nope, no mods.

Also, it turns out that setting Shadow Cascades to 40 causes the game to crash immediately after I start it up, so I had to reset it to ten manually through the CFG file.
